iti rUpARyasmAdBavantIti viSezaH .

‘PaReH pUrve GawAdayaH .’ iti mEtreya-kzIrasvAmyAdyupAttavacanAnusAreRa PaRa-

iti jYAyate; yataH ‘anyatra PARayati = GawaM niHsnehayatItyarTaH .’ iti
kzIrasvAmI baBARa . ‘… PaRa-R niHsnehane-- .’ iti kavikalpadruma-
(Slo 176) vAkyamapyatra niHsnehanArTe'sya DAtoH prayoge'nukUlam . PaRakaH-PARakaH-RikA, piPaRizakaH-zikA, paMPaRakaH-
pamPaRakaH-RikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakaRativat (157) [Page0912+ 32]
jYeyAni . 1. ‘kzubDasvAntaDvAntalagnamlizwaviribDaPARwabAQAni manTamanastamassaktAvispazwasva-
rAnAyAsaBfSezu’ (7-2-18) ityanenAsya DAtornizWAyAm, anAyAsasADyakazA-
yaviSezaScet prakftipratyayasamudAyenocyate tadAnImiqaBAvo nipAtyate . ‘anunAsikasya
kviJaloH kNiti’ (6-4-15) iti dIrGaH . paScAt, ‘zwunA zwuH’ (8-4-41) iti
zwutvena nizWAtakArasya wakAraH . anyatra PaRitamityeva .

pIyate yaH kazAyo'sO PARwo'nAyAsasADitaH ..’ iti pra. sarvasve .

SrutivyAKyAyAm (3-1-3-8) ‘navanItaM PARwaGftayorantarAlavarti’ ityAha .

prakzipya sadyo'Bizutya pUtvA pIyate . sa PARwa iti tadvidaH .’ ityAha . PARwaH A. ‘amlizwanAdA niraguH PARwacitrAstrapARayaH ..’ Ba. kA. 9. 17., 2. ktini, ‘titutrezvagrahAdInAm--’ (vA. 7-2-9) iti vacanAt iqiti jYeyam .
DAtUnAmanekArTakatvAd atra SabdArTakatvamityapi jYeyam . PaRitiH, 3. kartari liwaH kvasO, ‘PaRAM ca saptAnAm’ (6-4-125) ityetvAByAsalopavikalpaH .
‘vasvekAjAdGasAm’ (7-2-67) itIw . PeRivAn-pePaRivAn, B. ‘duzwAnapasKAdayituM prayAte kfzRe vilepuH PaRitA vimoham ..’ DA. kA. 2. 19. PaRitaH . iti
imAni rUpARi asya DAtorBavantIti viSezaH .

‘yadyaBiDAnamasti--Binduriti dfSyate .’ iti BidiDAtumatrAvayavArTe paWan,
tasyopratyayAnte Binduriti sADayaMSca sammatAkAro'pi pratiboDita iti
jYeyam . binduH B. ‘SrutAndukEScittagajendraroDinastuzyantu santo guRabindulolupAH ..’ DA. kA. 1. 9. .

vAkyopAdAnAt BvAdizvapi kaScana bilaDAturastIti jYAyate . kzIrasvAmi-
pramftiBiranupAdAnAdasmABirna liKitaH . belalaH--likA, belakaH-likA, bibelizakaH-bibilizakaH-zikA, bebilakaH- [Page0925+ 26]
likA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi tOdAdikakilativat (193) jYeyAni . 1. ‘igupaDajYA--’ (3-1-135) iti kartari kapratyaye rUpamevam . bilam, 2. bAhulakAt ORAdike vakpratyaye rUpamevam . pratyayasya kittvAnna guRaH . bilvam, 3. bAhulakAt ORAdike makpratyaye rUpamevam . bilmam .

matam .
belakaH-likA, bibelayizakaH-zikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi
cOrAdikacetayativat (522) jYeyAni . belayan-ntI, belayizyan-ntI-tI,

besakaH-sikA, besakaH-sikA, bibesizakaH-bibisizakaH-zikA, bebisakaH-
sikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakusyativat (234) jYeyAni . 4. ORAdike (da. u. 6-7) tanpratyaye, ‘titutrataTa--’ (7-2-9) ityAdinA iRnizeDe
ca rUpamevam . kecittu DAtorasya sewtve'pi, ‘aparimARabistAcita--’

ityeke .’ ityAha . ‘--ABAzaRe .’ iti SAkawAyanaH .

atra devamate'pi BAzaRamevArTa iti jYAyate . [Page0926+ 25]
bukkakaH-kkikA, bukkakaH-kkikA, bubukkizakaH-zikA, bobukkakaH-kkikA;

apratyaye--bukkA A. ‘aPakkatA'takyaguRena taNkatA KalaSvabukkAparuze pure'munA .’ DA. kA. 1. 17. iti .

(1119) “bukka BAzaRe” (X-curAdiH-1714. aka. sew. uBa.) ‘-- BazaRe’ iti DA. kA. (3-38) vyAKyAdfzwaH prAWaH .

bukkakaH-kkikA, bubukkayizakaH-zikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdika-

(3-2-137) iti tAcCIlika izRucpratyaye RerayAdeSe ca rUpamevamiti jYeyam . bukkayizRuH B. ‘saYcarcayan apanayAnaTa bukkayizRuH

(1121) “buDa avagamane” (I-BvAdiH-858. saka. sew. para.)
jvalAdiH . ‘buDyate boDatItyevaM buDeravagame dvayam .
buDiro boDanArTasya boDate boDatItyapi ..’ (Slo. 119) iti devaH .
avagamanam = udboDaH, jYAnaM ca . Adye-akarmakaH, dvitIye-sakarmakaH .
boDakaH-DikA, boDakaH-DikA, buboDizakaH-bubuDizakaH-zikA, bobuDakaH-
DikA ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakolativat (231) jYeyAni . [Page0927+ 29] 1. ‘buDayuDanaSajaneNprudrusruByo ReH’ (1-3-86) iti RyantAdasmAt parasmEpadameva .
yadA'yaM cittavatkartfkaH, tadA'pi, ‘aRAvakarmakAt cittavatkartfkAt’ (1-3-88)
iti RyantAt parasmEpadameveti jYeyam . atra, ‘gatibudDipratyavasAnArTa--’
(1-4-52) ityanena buGdyarTatvAt aRyantAvasTAyAM kartuH, RyantAvasTAyAM karmasaMjYetyapi
jYeyam . boDayan SizyaM Darmam . 2. ‘Bavizyati gamyAdayaH’ (3-3-3) iti sUtre, pra--pratipUrvakasyAsya RinipratyayAnta-
tvena gaRapAWAt BavizyatyarTe RiniH . praboDI-pratiboDI . rAjYAM 3. ‘matibudDipUjArTeByaSca’ (3-2-188) iti vartamAne AdikarmaRi ca ktapratyayaH .
‘udupaDAd BAvAdikarmaRoH--’ (1-2-21) iti kittvavikalpaH . ‘ktasya ca
vartamAne’ (2-3-67) iti zazWI . atra kzIrataraNgiRyAM bodDA, budDaH iti
iqrahitaprayogO pradarSitO . aniwkArikAsu (7-2-10) buDyati iti SyanA
nirdeSAt dEvAdikasyEvAniwtvamiti, asya BOvAdikatvena seqrUpARyeva BavantIti
ca yuktamutpaSyAmaH . boDitaH-buDito vA . 4. ‘jvalitikasanteByo RaH .’ (3-1-140) iti kartari RapratyayavikalpaH . tasya
vEkalpikatvAt, kartari pakze igupaDalakzaRakapratyaye buDaH, bibuDaH ityAdInAM
sidDiH . ‘aBiDAnalakzaRAH kfttadDitasamAsAntAH, (BAzyam-3-3-1) iti
vacanAt sAmAnyena vihitAnAmapi kftAM kvacit saMjYAyAmapi samBava iti, atra
kapratyayaH saMjYAyAmapi . tena buDaH iti grahaviSezasya, jAtiviSezasya ca saMjYA . vibuGaH A. ‘… tamahamito vilokya vibuDEH kftottamAyoDanam .’ Ba. kA. 10. 37. -boDaH, B. ‘tataH prAkAramArohat kzapAwAnaviboDayan .’ Ba. kA. 8. 56. aviboDayan .

(1122) “buDa avagamane”
(IV-divAdiH-1172. aka. ani. Atma.) [a] ‘tattvaM buDyate’ iti DarmakIrtti prayogAt, ‘kramAdamuM nArada ityaboDi saH ..’
(Si. va. 1. 3) iti mAGaprayogAcca sakarmakatvamapyasyAstIti jYAyate . paraM tu
‘atra buDAdInAM caturRAm, ‘aRAvakarmakAt--’ (1-3-88) ityeva sidDe,
vacanamidam acittavatkartfkArTam .’ iti pratipAdayato vfttikArAderetadanaBimata-
miti jYAyate . mA. DA. vfttO tu ‘ayamarTaBedena sakarmako'karmakaSca .’ iti
samAhitam .
‘buDyate boDatItyevaM buDeravagame dvayam .’ (Slo. 119) iti devaH . [Page0928+ 29]
boDakaH-DikA, boDakaH-DikA, 1. sannantARRvuli, ‘halantAcca’ (1-2-10) iti sanaH kittve, BazBAve cartve ca rUpam . buButsakaH-tsikA, bobuDakaH-DikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakzuDyativat (315) jYeyAni . 2. ‘kticktO ca saMjYAyAm’ (3-3-174) iti saMjYAyAm ktapratyayaH . buDyatIti
budDaH = sidDArTaH . budDaH, 3. ‘yuDibuDidfSeH kicca’ (da. u. 5-33) ityAnacpratyayaH, kicca . kittvAnna guRaH .
buDAnaH = AcAryaH . buDAnaH, 4. ‘mucibuDiByAM sanvacca’ iti mA. DA. vfttyupAttena ORAdikasUtreRa
Anacpratyaye, tasya sanvadBAvAt dvitve, kittve ca rUpam . bubuDAnaH =
bodDumicCuH . bubuDAnaH .

(1123) “buDir boDane” (I-BvAdiH-875. saka. sew. uBa.) ‘buDiro boDanArTasya boDate boDatItyapi ..’ (Slo. 119) iti devaH .
cAndrAH, kzIrasvAmI ca ‘buDa--’ ityaniritaM paWanti .
boDakaH-DikA, boDakaH-DikA, buboDizakaH-bubuDizakaH-zikA, bobuDakaH-DikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikakolativat (231) jYeyAni . 5. ‘buDayuDa--’ (1-3-86) ityatra, akarmakEH yuDa-naSa-janEH sAhacaryAt tAdfSasyA-
karmakasyEva grahaRamiti, sakarmako'yaM na tatra vivakzitaH . tenAsmAt ‘RicaSca’
(1-3-74) ityasya pravfttyA yaTAsamBavaM RyantAt SatA SAnacca BavatIti viSezaH . boDayamAnaH, A. ‘yA neditorvIpariSarDivIcIvimfdDavfkzAdiviboDyaSEtyA ..’ DA. kA. 2. 26. viboDyaH, 6. ‘karmaRyaR’ (3-2-1) ityaRi rUpamevam . tattvaboDaH- 7. tAcCIlye Rinipratyaye rUpamevam . striyAM NIp . tattvaboDinI .

(1124) “u bundir niSAmane”
(I-BvAdiH-876. saka. sew. uBa.) ‘u bunDir 8. “… AcAryapravfttirjYApayati-- ‘nEvaMjAtIyakAnAmididviDirBavati’ iti; yadayami-
ritaH kAMScinnumanuzaktAn paWati-- ‘u bundir niSAmane’… .” iti BAzya-
(1-3-7) vacanaprAmARyAt DakArapAWo'prAmARika iti jYeyam . anenEva BAzya-
vAkyena kutracidDAtuzu arTanirdeSaH pARinIya evetyapi boDyam . --’ iti nandI . ‘u bedir--’ ityanye .’ iti kzIrasvAmI .
‘u cundir--’ iti kASakftsnacandrO peWaturiti kzIrataraNgiRIwIkA . [Page0929+ 26]
bundakaH-ndikA, bundakaH-ndikA, bubundizakaH-zikA, bobudakaH-dikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikatumpativat (742) jYeyAni . 1. asya DAtoruBayapaditvAt SAnajapi BavatIti viSezaH . bundamAnaH-bundizyamARaH, 2. udittvena kttvAyAmiqvikalpanAt ‘yasya viBAzA’ (7-2-15) iti nizWA-
yAmiRnizeDe, upaDAnakAralope, nizWAtakAra-DAtudakArayornatve ca rUpamevam . bunnam-bunnaH-bunnavAn, 3. ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) iti ktvAyAmiqvikalpaH . iwpakze ‘na ktvA sew’
(1-2-18) iti kittvanizeDAdupaDAnakAralopo na . iqaBAvapakze tu nakAralope,
DAtudakArasya cartve ca buttvA iti dvitakArakaM rUpamiti jYeyam . bunditvA-buttvA, 4. GaYarTe kapratyaye, ‘kfYAdInAM ke dve BavataH’ (vA. 6-1-12) iti dvirvacane,
pfzodarAditvAt (6-3-109) halAdiSezABAve ca rUpamevam . budbudaH
ityAdIni rUpARyasya DAtoH viSezeRa samBavantIti viSezaH . A. ‘prabundyaveRIjavavenamAnA KAtAntikA cIvariBirnizAdEH .’ DA. kA. 2. 27. prabundyaH .

sikA; ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi dEvAdikakusyativat (234) jYeyAni . 5. igupaDalakzaRe kapratyaye rUpamevam . busam = DAnyAdInAM nissAro BAgaH . busam, B. ‘… vedavyozakfdapluzo bisitaDIkusyajjanAMhobusam .’ DA. kA. 2. 66. 6. yasmin kAle Kale busaM vartate sa kAlaH = Kalebusam . tizWadgupraBftizu (2-1-17)
pAWAt avyayIBAvasamAsaH, saptamyA aluk ca . Kalebusam, 7. ORAdike (da. u. 6-7) tanpratyaye, ‘titutrata--’ (7-2-9) ityAdinA iRnizeDe ca

(1128) “bfha vfdDO” (I-BvAdiH-735. aka. sew. para.) ‘… bfMhati barhati .
vfdDO, BAzArTavizaye bfMhayed barhayediti ..’ (Slo. 198) iti devaH .
barhakaH-rhikA, barhakaH-rhikA, bibarhizakaH-zikA, barIbfhakaH-hikA;

paribfQaH’ (7-2-21) ityanena praBAvaBiDeye nipAtitaH . anyatra paribfhitaH .
atra bfMhatereva sAnuzaNgasyedaM nipAtanamiti vArtikakArapakza iti padamaYjarya-
nusAreRa mA. DA. vfttAvuktam . BAzye darhatidfMhati vizaya eva prakftyantarasadBAve
pramARaM pradarSitamiti boDyam . kiYca, atra sarvatra BAzyakoSezu ‘praBO parivfQaH’
(7-2-21) ityupAdAya parivfQaH ityeva rUpasampAdanaM kftamiti jYAyate . ataSca
dantozWyAdiH varhatirliKizamAREva BAzyopAttetyapi jYAyate . atra tattvaM vidvAMso

(1129) “bfhi vfdDO Sabde ca” (I-BvAdiH-736. aka. sew. para.) [Page0931+ 26] atra SabdaH-gajaSabda eva, loke taTEva prayogAt . ‘bfhir--’ iti
candradurgO . ‘… bfMhati barhati .
vfdDO, BAzArTavizaye bfMhayet barhayediti ..’ (Slo. 198) iti devaH .
bfMhakaH-bfMhikA, bfMhakaH-bfMhikA, bibfMhizakaH-zikA, barIbfMhakaH-hikA;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi BOvAdikadarhativat (866) jYeyAni . 1. atrApi praBAvaBiDeye, ‘praBO paribfQaH’ (7-2-21) iti ktapratyayasyAniwtvaM takA-
rasya QatvaM nakArahakArayorlopaSca nipAtyate . anyatra bfhitam ityeva . ‘bfMhitaM =
karigarjitam .’ iti amaraH (2-8-107) . paribfQaH- A. ‘yAnErapyupabfMhito vihitavAn prAtaH prayAtuM manaH .’ DA. kA. 1. 92. upabfMhitaH, 2. ‘bfMhernalopaSca’ (da. u. 9-31) itIsipratyaye nalope ca rUpam . paScAt guRaH .
barhiH = vedyAstaraRam . barhiH, 3. ‘bfMhirno'cca’ (da. u. 6-74) iti maninpratyaye DAtUpaDAnakArasya akAre, paScAd
yaRi ca rUpam . brahma = paraM tejaH, vedaSca . brahma .

‘vfhU--’ ityeva paWanti . tatra kzIrasvAmI ‘bfhu--’ iti uditaM papAWa .

(1132) “brUY vyaktAyAM vAci”
(II-adAdiH-1044. aka. [ani.] sew. uBa.) 1. ArDaDAtuke vivakzite ‘bruvo vaciH’ (2-4-53) iti vacyAdeSe rUpamevam .
evameva tfjAdizu sarvatra SudDe, RvulAdizu Ryante ca vacyAdeSe rUpaM jYeyam . vAcakaH-cikA, vAcakaH-cikA, 2. sannantARRvuli vacyAdeSe rUpam . tatra vacyAdeSasya ‘paciM vaciM--’
ityAniwkArikAsu (BAzye-7-2-10) vacanAdaniwtvam . kutvazatvayoH rUpamevam .
evameva santante sarvatra prakriyA jYeyA . vivakzakaH-kzikA, vAvacakaH-cikA;
vaktA-vaktrI, vAcayitA-trI, vivakzitA-trI, vAvacitA-trI; 3. Satari, adAditvAt Sapo luki, SatuH sArvaDAtukatvena NittvAt, ‘aci SnuDAtu--’
(6-4-77) ityAdinovaNi rUpamevam . bruvan-tI, vAcayan-ntI, vivakzan-ntI; --
vakzyan-ntI-tI, vAcayizyan-ntI-tI, vivakzizyan-ntI-tI; --
bruvARaH, vAcayamAnaH, vivakzamARaH, vAvacyamAnaH;
vakzyamARaH, vAcayizyamARaH, vivakzizyamARaH, vAvacizyamARaH; 4. tAcCIlike kvipi, ‘kvib vacipracCi--’ (vA. 3-2-178) iti dIrGo'saMprasAraRaM ca
Bavati . suvAk-suvAg-suvAcO-suvAcaH; -- -- 5. nizWAyAm, ‘vacisvapiyajAdInAM kiti’ (6-1-15) iti vakArasya saMprasAraRe,
‘samprasAraRAcca’ (6-1-108) iti pUrvarUpe ca rUpamevam . evameva ktini, ktvAyAM
ca rUpanizpattirboDyA . uktam-uktaH-uktavAn, vAcitam-taH, vivakzitaH, vAvacitaH-tavAn; [Page0933+ 28] 1. bravIti iti bruvaH . kartari pacAdyaci rUpam . ‘GarUpakalpacelawbruva--’ (6-3-43)
iti sUtre ‘bruva’ iti nipAtanAt guRABAve, vacyAdeSABAve ca rUpam . anenEva
sUtreRa BAzitapuMskAt parasya NIppratyayAntasyAnekAco hrasvaH . kASikAyAmeva
(8-1-27) sUtre ‘bruva iti bruvaH kan, nipAtanAt vacyAdeSABAvaSca .’ ityukta-
mapyatrAnusanDeyam . bruvaH, brAhmaRibruvA, 2. ‘ugitaSca’ (6-3-45) iti bruvaSabde pare hrasvavikalpaH . viduzibruvA-viduzIbruvA, SreyasibruvA-SreyasIbruvA, 3. ‘puMvadBAvo'pyatra pakze vaktavyaH’ (kASikA. 6-3-45) iti vfttikAra-
vacanAdatra puMvadBAve vidvadbruvA, SreyobruvA iti rUpe BavataH . paraMtu BAzye
nEtAdfSaM vacanaM dfSyate . vidvadbruvA, SreyobruvA, vAk- 4. kvibantAt striyAM wApi rUpamevam . ‘ApaM cEva halantAnAM yaTA vAcA niSA
diSA .’ iti BAgurivacanAt wAp iti si. kOmudI . BAzye tu nEtAdfSaM
vacanaM dfSyate . vAcA, 5. ‘upeyivAnanASvAnanUcAnaSca’ (3-2-109) ityanena, ‘anu’ ityupasargapUrvakAdasmAt
liwaH kartari kAnaci, samprasAraRe pUrvarUpe dvitve savarRadIrGe ca ‘anUcAnaH’ iti
sidDyati . anUcAnaH = sANgavedADyetA . anUcAnaH, A. ‘idamUcuranUcAnAH prItikaRwakitatvacaH ..’ kumArasamBave 6-15. 6. vAkCabdAt ‘vAco gminiH’ (5-2-124) iti matvarTIye gminipratyaye
rUpamevam . praSastavAgvati pratyayo'yam . atrEva prakaraRe ‘AlajAwacO bahuBAziRi’
(5-2-125) iti kutsitArTe matvarTIye Alac-AwacpratyayayoH vAcAlaH, vAcAwaH
iti rUpe ityapi jYeyam . vAggmI, vAcAlaH-vAcAwaH, 7. ‘BavyageyapravacanIya--’ (3-4-68) ityAdinA kartari anIyar pratyayaH .
pravacanIyaH = brAhmaRaH . atra karmaRyeva pratyayo nipAtyate iti mate tu pravaca-
nIyaH = anuvAkaH . pravacanIyaH (brAhmaRaH, anuvAko vA), 8. guRam uktavAn iti guRavacanaH . ‘kftyalyuwo bahulam’ (3-3-113) iti BUte
kartari lyuwpratyayaH . atra ca nidAnam, ‘guRavacanabrAhmaRAdiByaH--’
(5-1-124) ityatra ‘guRavacana--’ iti nirdeSa eveti jYeyam . guRavacanaH, vAcaH viva kzuH, vAvacaH;
vaktavyam, vAcayitavyam, vivakzitavyam, vAvacitavyam;

(1194) “Blakza adane” (I-BvAdiH-893. aka. sew. uBa.) ‘Bakza’ iti kzIrasvAmI iti mA. DAtuvfttAvuktam . puruzakAre'pyevameva .

BakzaH .’ ityuktatvAt adanArTakasya BakzaterBvAdizu kutrApyapAWAt, enameva [Page0987+ 28]
BakzatiM manute iti BAti . durgAdayastu DAtumamuM ‘plakza--’ iti paWanti .
“tasya SiraH CittvA meGaM prAkzArayan, sa prakzo'Bavat . tat prakzasya prakzatvam-yat
plakzaSAKA--” (mEtrAyaRIyasaMhitA-6-3-10-2) iti SrutyanusAreRa
prapUrvakAt kzarateH pacAdyaci kapilakAderAkftigaRatvAt (vA. 8-2-18)

sammatamiti, anyaTA (plakzaDAtusadBAve) asmAdeva pacAdyaci plakzaSabdasidDeH,
SrOtanirvacanasyAprasakteriti manIzayA ca sudUraM vicArya mADavaDAtuvfttO
pAWo'yaM nirasta iti jYeyam . SatapaTabrAhmaRe (3-8-3-12) ‘praKyo havE
nAmEtat yat plakzaH .’ ityuktamapIha Dyeyam .

sarvARi rUpARi BOvAdikaDrajativat (926) jYeyAni . asya DAtoH uBayapadi-
tvAt SAnaci-BlakzamARaH, BlakzizyamARaH, iti viSezaH . lyapi- A. ‘lAzeRa cAzAMSCazitAn JazitvA praBlakzya Bakzanti yadambu nIcAH .’ DA. kA. 2. 28. praBlakzya iti .

(1207) “maqi viBAjane” (I-BvAdiH-272. saka. sew. Atma.) [a] DAtupAWe ‘vaqi viBAjane; maqi ca’ iti pAWyate . tatra ‘vaqi maqi viBA-
jane’ ityekadEva paWitavye pfTak sUtrakaraRAt arTAntare'pi maqiDAturvartate iti
kzIrasvAmyAdayaH pratipAdayanti . tad yaTA maRqaH = rasAgram . atra taRqulA-
dInAM pacanAvasare kvaTanAnantaraM ya UrDvaM rasasyAvaraRarUpeRAvirBAvaH sa rasAgrami-
tyucyate; atrApi DAtorasya vfttirityarTaH . evam, maRqUram (= lohamalam)
maRqalam, maRqapaH ityAdizvapyasya DAtorarTAntaravfttirjYeyA . kASakftsna-
DAtupAWIyavyAKyAyAM (kannaqaBAzAmayyAM) ‘vaqi maqi vezwane’ iti pawyate
iti kzI wIkA (pf. 41) . “nandI tu ‘maqi vezwane’ iti paWati .” iti
DAtuvfttiH . paraM tu kzIrataraNgiRyAM-- “nandI tu ‘vawi viBAjane, vaqi
vezwane’ iti BaNgyA paWati .” ityeva dfSyate . IdfSasTalezu SudDapAWaH kIdfSa
iti granTErnirDArayituM na Sakyate . sarvaTA maqiDAturanekArTaka iti sAraH . ‘BUzArTe maRqatIti syAt tatra maRqayatIti RO .
maRqate vezwane… ..’ (Slo. 84) iti devaH .
maRqakaH-RqikA, maRqakaH-RqikA, mimaRqizakaH-zikA, mAmaRqakaH-RqikA;

BUzarRArTakasyEva maRqaDAtorgrahaRamiti vfttyAdizu pratipAditatvAdatra na yujiti
jYeyam . spazwamidaM mA. DA. vfttO . maRqitA, 2. ‘SalimaRqiByAmUkaR’ [da. u. 3-47] ityUkaRpratyayaH . maRqate kzitimiti
maRqUkaH = BekaH . maRqUkaH, 3. ORAdike [da. u. 8-107] kalapratyaye rUpamevam . maRqyate = vezwyate iti
maRqalam = parivAraH . maRqalam, ityAdInyasmAd BavantIti viSezaH . A. ‘prahuRqitAnEkzata cArukuRqalAn pravaRqitArTAn avimaRqitASayAn .’ DA. kA. 1. 36. maRqitaH .

lokaprayogato'rTAntare vfttirityUhyamiti pradarSanAyAsmABiretadatropAttam . maRitam, [Page0993+ 24] 1. ‘ik kfzyAdiByaH’ (vA. 3-3-108) iti BAvAdO striyAm ikpratyaye rUpamevam . maRiH, 2. maRireva, maRiriva ityAdizvarTezu tadDite kanpratyaye rUpamevam . ‘maRikaH = mahA-
kumBaH .’ iti kzIrasvAmI . maRikam, maRikaH ityAdIni rUpARyasmAd BavantIti viSezaH .

(1446) “lakza darSanANkanayoH”
(X-curAdiH-1538. saka. sew. uBa.) [a] mEtreyarakzitamatenAsya DAtoH svaritettvaM na iti puruzakAropAtta (dEve-Slo. 182)
vacanAjjYAyate . padamaYjaryAmapi ‘eza viDirna curAdiRyantAt syAditi kaScana
niScinute sma . Aptavaco'tra na kiYcana dfzwaM lakzayateH svaritettvamanArzam ..’
(1-3-74) iti pArAyaRagranTasTaSlokodAharaRapradarSanapurassaraM sADitam .

‘AlocanArTARRici lakzayeta, syAllakzayellakzayate'NkanArTAt ..’
(Slo. 182) iti devaH . lakzakaH-kzikA, lilakzayizakaH-zikA; lakzayitA-trI lilakzayizitA-trI;
ityAdIni sarvARyapi rUpARi cOrAdikapakzayativat (956) jYeyAni .
lyuwi-lakzaRam 1. lakzyate'neneti lakzaRam . reKA, tilakAdyaNkanam, vyAkaraRAdiSAstraM ca . yati-lakzyam, lAkzaRikaH, 2. ‘lakzermuw ca’ (da. u. 1-84) iti Ipratyayo muqAgamaSca . lakzmIH, 3. ‘lakzmyA acca’ (ga. sU. 5-2-100) iti matvarTIye nakArapratyaye Ratve IkArasya
cAkAre lakzmaRaH iti rUpam . lakzmaRaH = rAmasyAnujaH . lakzmaRaH imAni rUpARi
asya DAtoH iti viSezaH . lyapi-upalakzya .
